info.title: Indian Railways - National Train Enquiry System NTES
info.description: This API provides information related to Indian Railways Trains. You can get the list of stations, trains between stations, route of a train, current running status of the train and get PNR current status. This is unofficial NTES API. NTES provides train-running related and real-time status queries for all trains of India.

get.description: Returns Schedule of a given Train
Returns run details of a train for a given Station

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: Enter date_type; values { Today : TD; Tomorrow : TM; Yesterday : YS }

get.description: RETURNS all train details for a given Station

parameters.name: in_next_hour
parameters.description: Enter TimeSpan for trains to find; Value is in hours; Example : 2, 3, 4 etc

parameters.name: to_station
parameters.description: ( OPTIONAL ) Going to Station ; Example: BHP

parameters.name: train_type
parameters.description: REFER train_type in DATA GROUP ENDPOINT

get.description: Returns Cancelled Trains For a Given Date

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: values { Today : TD; Tomorrow : TM; Yesterday : YS }

parameters.name: excp_type
parameters.description: Cancelled train type : values { Fully Cancelled : EC , Partially Cancelled : EPC }

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: values { Today : TD; Tomorrow : TM; Yesterday : YS }

parameters.name: date_type
parameters.description: values { Today : TD; Tomorrow : TM; Yesterday : YS }
